group.name: thread_collaboration
group.title: Thread Collaboration Settings
group.description: Settings for the Thread Collaboration plugin.

allowed_groups.title: Allowed Usergroups
allowed_groups.description: Select which usergroups can use thread collaboration features.

allowed_forums.title: Allowed Forums
allowed_forums.description: Select forums where Thread Collaboration will work. Choose "All Forums" to enable in all forums, "Select forums" to choose specific forums, or "None" to disable.

moderator_usergroups.title: Moderator & Management Usergroups
moderator_usergroups.description: Usergroups with collaboration management permissions. These users can: 1) Manage collaborations (invite/remove) on any thread they can moderate, 2) View pending collaboration invitations, 3) Edit posts in collaboration threads, 4) Have their posts protected from editing by non-moderators. Typically include Moderators, Super Moderators, and Administrators.

enable_chat_page.title: Enable Chat Page
enable_chat_page.description: Enable the collaborative chat page feature where users can have real-time discussions about the thread.

enable_draft_page.title: Enable Draft Page
enable_draft_page.description: Enable the collaborative draft page feature where users can collaboratively write and edit posts before publishing.

chat_allowed_forums.title: Chat Page Allowed Forums
chat_allowed_forums.description: Select forums where the Chat Page will be available. Choose "All Forums" to enable in all forums, "Select forums" to choose specific forums, or "None" to disable.

draft_allowed_forums.title: Draft Page Allowed Forums
draft_allowed_forums.description: Select forums where the Draft Page will be available. Choose "All Forums" to enable in all forums, "Select forums" to choose specific forums, or "None" to disable.

default_roles.title: Default Roles
default_roles.description: Default roles available for selection (one per line, format: Role Name|Icon Code).
default_roles.value:
Writer|fas fa-pen
Artist|fas fa-palette
Graphic Designer|fas fa-brush
Script Writer|fas fa-scroll
Translator|fas fa-language
Announcer|fas fa-bullhorn

owner_default_icon.title: Default Owner Icon (CSS class)
owner_default_icon.description: CSS class for the default icon shown with the Owner role (e.g. 'fas fa-crown').

show_icons.title: Show Role Icons
show_icons.description: Display icons next to role names.

show_avatars.title: Show User Avatars
show_avatars.description: Display user avatars in collaboration lists, invitations, and requests. When disabled, only usernames will be shown.

max_collaborators.title: Maximum Collaborators
max_collaborators.description: Maximum number of collaborators allowed per thread (0 for unlimited).

max_threads_per_user.title: Maximum Threads Per User
max_threads_per_user.description: Maximum number of threads a user can be a collaborator in (0 for unlimited).

max_roles_per_user.title: Maximum Roles Per User
max_roles_per_user.description: Maximum number of different roles a user can have across all threads (0 for unlimited).

invitation_system.title: Enable Invitation System
invitation_system.description: Enable the collaboration invitation system where users must accept invitations before becoming collaborators.

enable_requests.title: Enable Collaboration Requests
enable_requests.description: Allow users to request to collaborate on threads they do not own.

invitation_expiry.title: Invitation Expiry Days
invitation_expiry.description: Number of days after which pending invitations automatically expire (0 for no expiry).

request_expiry.title: Request Expiry Days
request_expiry.description: Number of days after which pending collaboration requests automatically expire (0 for no expiry).

auto_cleanup.title: Auto Cleanup Expired Invitations
auto_cleanup.description: Automatically remove expired invitations from the database.

auto_cleanup_requests.title: Auto Cleanup Expired Requests
auto_cleanup_requests.description: Automatically remove expired collaboration requests from the database.

pm_notifications.title: PM Notifications
pm_notifications.description: Send private message notifications to collaborators when they are added.

pm_on_update.title: PM Notifications on Update
pm_on_update.description: Send private message notifications when collaborator roles are updated (in addition to when they are first added).

request_notifications.title: Request PM Notifications
request_notifications.description: Send private message notifications for collaboration requests.

custom_pm_message.title: Custom PM Message Template
custom_pm_message.description: Customize the private message sent to collaborators. Use {1} for inviter username, {2} for thread subject, {3} for role, {4} for thread link, {5} for UCP collaboration invitations URL. Leave empty to use default message.

enable_collaborator_editing.title: Enable Collaborator Post Editing
enable_collaborator_editing.description: Allow thread collaborators to edit each other's posts within the thread.

allow_edit_any_post.title: Allow Collaborators To Edit Any Posts
allow_edit_any_post.description: If enabled, collaborators can edit any posts in threads they collaborate on (edit permission only). If disabled, collaborators can only edit posts by other collaborators and the thread owner.

require_approval_for_protected.title: Require approval for protected owners
require_approval_for_protected.description: If enabled, edits by non-protected collaborators to posts owned by protected collaborators will be saved as drafts pending owner approval.

show_in_postbit.title: Show Role in Postbit
show_in_postbit.description: Display collaborator roles in user postbit when they are collaborators in the thread.

show_owner_role_mode.title: Owner Role Visibility Always
show_owner_role_mode.description: If Yes, always show thread owner's role. If No, show only when collaborators exist.

show_owner_role_form_always.title: Show Owner Role Form Always
show_owner_role_form_always.description: When enabled, the 'Set your role' form will always be visible for thread owners, even when there are no collaborators. When disabled, it only shows when collaborators exist.

show_pending_invitations.title: Show Pending Invitations
show_pending_invitations.description: Display pending collaboration invitations in the thread collaboration info box.

pending_invitations_usergroups.title: Pending Invitations Viewing Usergroups
pending_invitations_usergroups.description: Usergroups that can view pending collaboration invitations in the thread collaboration info box. Thread owners can always see pending invitations for their own threads regardless of this setting.

manager_invite_as_owner.title: Manager Invite as Owner
manager_invite_as_owner.description: When enabled, Management Usergroups users can choose to invite collaborators as the thread owner instead of themselves. This helps maintain the appearance that invitations come from the thread creator.

enable_user_settings.title: Enable User Collaboration Settings
enable_user_settings.description: Allow thread creators to configure collaboration request settings in their User Control Panel.

enable_tabbed_usercp.title: Enable Tabbed User CP Interface
enable_tabbed_usercp.description: When enabled, the User CP collaboration page will use a modern tabbed interface with Settings, Statistics, and Other tabs. When disabled, it uses the traditional single-page layout.
